content: When I saw this <style=Highlight>Handmade Tabby Cat Plushie</style>, {A小坏笑}it reminded me of a friend of mine — he looked just like this when he was little, all round and chubby. Very amusing.
info: NPC星湾标签-喜爱标签3-1013萨飞里_1013-萨飞里

content: However, he ran much faster than I did, and was always the first to catch prey.
info: NPC星湾标签-喜爱标签3-1013萨飞里_1013-萨飞里
